channel.title: Bugs/Feedback: Notification tab class cards
channel.description:
Hey Muflin here,
So I went through all the notifications in the notification tab of the class cards ingame. and I found some little bugs, and other stuff that I was curious about or thought that should be changed. In the imgur post below is a list of what I've found.
https://imgur.com/a/XT7vc
Friendly greetings,
Your friendly neighbourhood Muflin
